name: Treasure Explorer
description:
Explore the whole lake to discover hidden treasures!

Use the hints provided to look for where the treasure is located.

Good luck!

(See the info button when you start an exploration level to learn additional important information)

The purpose of this prototype is to test out an exploration minigame for another game I am working on.  Please let me know what you think:

Do you feel like you're exploring?  Is it fun?  What other thoughts do you have?

Most art assets are were found online in random google searches.  All code is developed by me.
